title: The Watcher
description: In this Dateline classic, a recent law school graduate in Georgia with a promising future disappears without a trace. What could have happened? Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on June 8, 2018.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
